title: Conscious Cannabis Capitalism With Roger Volodarsky, Puffco CEO
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Roger Volodarsky is founder and CEO of Puffco, an award-winning company that sees concentrates as the future of cannabis consumption. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss scaling while failing, what it takes to be a successful and humane leader and the lessons of starting a business from nothing. We also cover chasing innovation, the state of the vaping industry, why Puffco focuses on concentrates and why they moved their business to California. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
